entry.title: Deals & Dreams: Unpacking Business Moves and Innovations
entry.summary: In recent global business developments, Tazz is set to enter a new phase as it prepares for acquisition by Wolt, signaling a strategic move in the food delivery sector. Meanwhile, Aston Martin has unveiled a limited edition DB12 model, paying homage to an iconic James Bond film, which is likely to attract automotive enthusiasts and collectors alike. In the chemicals industry, Sudarshan Chemical has finalized an agreement to acquire the Heubach Group, highlighting ongoing consolidation in the sector. Financial analysts at ICICI Securities have initiated coverage on Skipper, giving it a 'Buy' rating, indicating confidence in the company's future performance. In the mining sector, Exxaro is actively seeking to acquire manganese mining assets, while Rio Tinto has announced plans to acquire Arcadium Lithium for a substantial $6.7 billion, reflecting the growing demand for lithium in the energy transition. Additionally, a study suggests that providing glasses to Indian students with poor vision could unlock an impressive ₹156 billion annually, emphasizing the importance of addressing educational accessibility. Lastly, Alpine has teased its upcoming all-electric sport fastback, the A390_β, which promises to add to the growing trend of electric vehicles in the automotive market.
